name: Pearl Izumi Elite LTD Thermal Jersey - Women's
description: A cold-weather riding essential, this thermal layer holds your heat in close on sub-zero days. The fabric dries quickly and won't be the most fragrant thing in the coffee shop after your intervals.Polyester Thermal Fleece insulates and remains breathable, fast drying and odour-resistant.Back pockets house mid-ride essentials.Reflective elements for early morning or late afternoon rides.
